column4: If I install Ubuntu on an IMac g3, Will I still be able to set the Power-on time for the box?
I mean the time that the box will power up by itself.
oh you mean like a scheduled boot up?
Cool, Do you know the package that can do it?
linux by default has a function, IIRC
Ok, I found IIRC.        --- is there an API or app to set the auto power-up time?
built in I think, haven't used it, google it
don't really know, never used scheduled startup
Is there a nice place to go to browse the kernel source?
not the best person to ask lol
